actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on United Nations action on Puerto Rico.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that it deplores and rejects the action by a Committee of the United Nations General Assembly condemning the existing relationship between Puerto Rico and the United States. Calls upon the Secretary of State to study whether those governments which supported the Committee's action are in violation of United Nations principles concerning colonial dependency and denial of the right of self-determination. Calls upon the President to inform those governments which supported the Committee's action that the United States regards such support as an unfriendly act.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate on United Nations action on Puerto Rico.
